Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.app

Class UserListener

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp22.app.UserListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class UserListener extends Object implements KeyListener
This class listens and reacts to keypresses of the user
Author:
David Lindsay

    • exitGame

      public static void exitGame()
      Exits the game. The current game state will be lost, the next time the game is started, it will resume from the last unfinished level

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame()
      exit the game, saves the game state, game will resume next time the application will be started

    • loadSavedGame

      public static void loadSavedGame()
      resume a saved game -- this will pop up a file selector to select a saved game to be loaded

    • pauseGame

      public static void pauseGame()
      Pauses game, displays a "Game is paused" dialog

      public static void resumeGame()
      Removed "Game is paused" dialog, resumes game

      public static void nextLevel()
